entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow at times before morning. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:04 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
